titlestmt.titleproper: Stephen Browne bibliography on Byron Browne

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-04-06 15:35:22 -0400.

did.unittitle: Stephen Browne bibliography on Byron Browne

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Use of original papers requires an appointment and is limited to the Archives' Washington, D.C., Research Center. Microfilmed materials must be consulted on microfilm. Contact Reference Services for more information.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A computer-printed bibliography compiled by Browne regarding his father, Byron Browne. Includes a list of works exhibited, and lists of articles, reviews, and books about Byron Browne.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: 35mm microfilm reel 2787 available at Archives of American Art offices and through interlibrary loan.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Son of artists Byron and Rosalind Bengelsdorf Browne; New York, N.Y.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated 1982 by Stephen B. Browne, son of Byron Browne.
